page.title: 06A TALK WITH THE VICAR,UPWEY
page.content: IN AN INTERVIEW WITH MR.FREER THE VICAR OF ST. LAWRENCE'S CHURCH THE FOLLOWING INFORMATION CAME TO LIGHT: {HOW OLD IS THE CHURCH? } THE OLDEST PART IS 500 YEARS OLD. {HAS ANYTHING CHANGED RECENTLY?} NEW AISLE SCREENS,AND NEW BOILERS. {WHAT IS THE SIZE OF THE CONGREGATION?} ABOUT 40 REGULARS PLUS SUMMER VISITORS {IS THERE A PARISH MAGAZINE?} THERE IS A CHURCH MAGAZINE. {HAVE YOU HAD ANY FAMOUS PEOPLE HERE?} NO,BUT THE DESCENDANTS OF SOME EMIGRANTS COME TO VISIT THE CHURCH QUITE REGULARLY FROM AMERICA. {WHO HAS BEEN COMING TO CHURCH FOR THE} {LONGEST TIME?} MRS.KEATS AND MR.SMART,BOTH IN THEIR 70'S HAVE BEEN MEMBERS OF THE CONGREGATION SINCE THEY WERE SMALL CHILDREN.
